snippet: Manager Joe Girardi was able to stick around for all of the Yankees' 5-2 victory over the Miami Marlins on Monday night, despite a heated argument with home plate umpire Laz Diaz in the first inning.
abstract: Manager Joe Girardi was able to stick around for all of the Yankees' 5-2 victory over the Miami Marlins on Monday night, despite a heated argument with home plate umpire Laz Diaz in the first inning.

headline.main: Girardi Eludes Ejection in Yankees' Win
